org.spongepowered.api.service.permission

Interface PermissionService


  • public interface PermissionService
    Represents a provider for permissions. This is the interface that a permissions plugin must implement to provide permissions for a user.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String SUBJECTS_GROUP 
      static java.lang.String SUBJECTS_USER 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SubjectData getDefaultData()
      This is a transient data object that contains data that will be applied by default to all subjects.
      SubjectCollection getGroupSubjects()
      Returns the collection of group subjects available.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SubjectCollection> getKnownSubjects()
      Returns an immutable copy of the mapping of all subject collections stored by this permission service.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<SubjectCollection> getSubjects(java.lang.String identifier)
      Returns a subject collection with the given identifier.
      SubjectCollection getUserSubjects()
      Returns the permissions level that describes users.
      void registerContextCalculator(ContextCalculator calculator)
      Register a function that calculates contexts relevant to a given user at the time the function is called.

    • Field Detail

      • SUBJECTS_USER

        static final java.lang.String SUBJECTS_USER
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SUBJECTS_GROUP

        static final java.lang.String SUBJECTS_GROUP
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getUserSubjects

        SubjectCollection getUserSubjects()
        Returns the permissions level that describes users. User identifiers are expected to be UUIDs in RFC4122 string format (This *does* have dashes. Mojang is stupid).
        Returns:
        A subject collection for users

      • getGroupSubjects

        SubjectCollection getGroupSubjects()
        Returns the collection of group subjects available.
        Returns:
        A collection managing group subjects

      • getDefaultData

        SubjectData getDefaultData()
        This is a transient data object that contains data that will be applied by default to all subjects.
        Returns:
        The default data object, which will accept modifications but which is transient

      • getSubjects

        com.google.common.base.Optional<SubjectCollection> getSubjects(java.lang.String identifier)
        Returns a subject collection with the given identifier.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier
        Returns:
        a subject collection, or null if this permission service does not support alternate subject collections.

      • getKnownSubjects

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,SubjectCollection> getKnownSubjects()
        Returns an immutable copy of the mapping of all subject collections stored by this permission service.
        Returns:
        The known subjects for this map

      • registerContextCalculator

        void registerContextCalculator(ContextCalculator calculator)
        Register a function that calculates contexts relevant to a given user at the time the function is called.
        Parameters:
        calculator - The context calculator to register
